Title: Two brothers escape kidnappers in Edo
Summary: Isaac and Victor Olayere were kidnapped on November 8 along the Adughe–Imoga Road in Edo State . The victims, who were taken into the bush shortly after the abduction, had thrown the Uma/Imoga road .

Title: Abuja court stops PDP from convening national convention
Summary: Federal High Court in Abuja has again halted the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) from proceeding with its planned National Convention scheduled for November 15 and 16, 2025, in Ibadan, the Oyo State capital . The convention was intended to elect PDP members .

Title: Ex-president Shehu Shagari’s widow dies at 89
Summary: Hajiya Sutura Sutura Shehu-Shagari has died at the age of 89 . The last surviving wife of Nigeria’s former President, Shehu Shagari, has died aged 89 . A statement issued on Monday by the head of the family, Capt. Muhammad Bala Shagar, said Hajiya

Title: Reps probe $4.6b HIV, malaria grants
Summary: Reps inaugurated an investigative hearing into the over $4.6 billion grants Nigeria received between 2021 and 2025 from the Global Fund ($1.8 billion) and the United States Agency for International Development (USAID) for HIV, malaria grants .

Title: COAS tasks military police on upholding discipline, regimentation in army
Summary: COAS tasks military police on upholding discipline, regimentation in army . The increasingly complex and dynamic nature of modern warfare demands a more adaptive and holistic approach .

Title: Trump’s threat: Use local, foreign collaboration to crush terrorists, OPC tells Tinubu
Summary: The Oodua People's Congress (OPC) urged President Bola Tinubu to forge a Nigerian and international collaboration to eliminate terrorism, kidnapping and killings inflicted on the country by non-state actors .

Title: 2026 World Cup will be my last – Ronaldo
Summary: Cristiano Ronaldo says next year's World Cup will be his last as he winds down one of the all-time great careers . The Portuguese superstar says 2026 World Cup is his last . Ronaldo: "2026 will be my last"

Title: PDP begs Makinde to stop ‘illegal moves’ to overturn Ekiti guber primary election
Summary: PDP begs Makinde to stop ‘illegal moves’ to overturn Ekiti guber primary election . "The people have voted; they voted for their conscience. They voted for the man they believed in who can give the PDP victory at the polls," he said .

Title: Lamine Yamal withdrawn from Spain duty amid controversy over treatment
